title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 459.1 - Responsibilities of social services officials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 459.1 - Responsibilities of social services officials

State Regulations
(a) A social services official shall, to the
extent that funds have been made available therefor, provide senior citizen
center services for senior citizens either directly or by purchase from: (1)
a private nonprofit corporation, company
or association; or
(2)
a city or
town or other government agency within such social services district. (b) The social services official
shall have continuing basic responsibility for the quality and effectiveness of
services purchased from senior citizen centers. (c) Any purchase of service agreement for
social group services for senior citizens should be in conformity with the
requirements of purchase of services by social services districts, as
prescribed by Part 405 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
459.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
